body_text:
Since launching preference experiments 2 months ago, we've twice now been asked to run experiments that operate on more than one preference. While not a high priority, we should consider adding the capability to specify multiple preferences to operate on in a single experiment, and what their values should be set to per-branch.
Milestone
Project
Issues

title: Multi-preference experiments
body:
Since launching preference experiments 2 months ago, we've twice now been asked to run experiments that operate on more than one preference. While not a high priority, we should consider adding the capability to specify multiple preferences to operate on in a single experiment, and what their values should be set to per-branch.

# [Milestone](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/milestone/17)

# [Project](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/projects/11)

# Issues
